meanings.definition: A unit of computing speed equal to one million floating-point operations per second.
meanings.sent1: My computer can process a megaflop of data every second.
meanings.sent2: The supercomputer at the research facility can perform one megaflop per second.
meanings.sent3: When the old computer tried to handle the new software, it crashed faster than a megaflop!
meanings.sent4: Her brain worked at a megaflop pace, quickly solving complex equations.
meanings.sent5: The speed of a megaflop is mind-boggling, making calculations lightning fast.

meanings.definition: A failure or disaster on a large scale.
meanings.sent1: The project turned into a megaflop, costing the company millions.
meanings.sent2: The movie was a megaflop at the box office, disappointing many fans.
meanings.sent3: His attempt at cooking dinner turned into a megaflop when he burned everything.
meanings.sent4: The event was a megaflop, with technical issues causing chaos throughout.
meanings.sent5: The team's performance was a megaflop, resulting in a humiliating defeat.
